West Country Goats Cheese: This was made to a similar recipe to Village Green by Cornish Country Larder in their Somerset creamery at North Braden
production has ceased following the sale of the creamery although production may start again elsewhere.
This was a younger cheeese and devoid of the green wax coat seen on Village Green.
It exhibited the same sweet nutty notes
and has a brilliant white colour characteristic of most British goats' milk cheeses.
